meta.name: Fake Deafen
meta.tagline: Adds a button next to the deafen button to fake deafen.
meta.description:
Fake Deafen allows you to appear deafen but still hear and talk.
Code from GameActivityToggle

muteUponFakeDeafen.description: Mutes you when you fake deafen

mute.description: Tells Discord to show you as muted, but you're not actually muted

deafen.description: Tells Discord to show you as deafened, but you're not actually deafened

cam.description: Tells Discord to show you with a webcam on, but since there's no source to be defined, it will load infinitely
